nodes.title: SWE Portfolio Page
nodes.prompt: Create me an SWE portfolio page
nodes.what: A personal portfolio page for showcasing software engineering projects and skills.
nodes.how: Organized into sections like About Me, Projects, Skills, and Contact.

children.title: Hero Section
children.prompt: Design the hero section for the portfolio page.

children.title: Contact Section
children.prompt: Provide a way to contact the software engineer.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Design the hero section for the portfolio page.
nodes.what: A visually striking hero section to introduce the portfolio.
nodes.how: Use a large background image, a headline, and a call-to-action button.

children.title: Call-to-Action Button
children.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.

nodes.title: Projects Showcase
nodes.what: A section to display software engineering projects.
nodes.how: Use a grid layout with project cards.

children.title: Project Card
children.prompt: Design a project card to showcase individual projects.

children.title: Grid Layout
children.prompt: Create a grid layout for displaying project cards.

children.title: Filter Bar
children.prompt: Add filtering options for the projects showcase.

nodes.title: Contact Section
nodes.prompt: Provide a way to contact the software engineer.
nodes.what: A contact section for reaching out to the software engineer.
nodes.how: Include a contact form and social media links.

children.title: Contact Form
children.prompt: Design a contact form for the contact section.

nodes.title: Call-to-Action Button
nodes.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.
nodes.what: A button designed to encourage user interaction, typically leading to a key action.
nodes.how: Use bold colors, clear text, and hover effects to make the button stand out.

nodes.title: Project Card
nodes.prompt: Design a project card to showcase individual projects.
nodes.what: A card element to display project details.
nodes.how: Include project title, description, and an image.

nodes.title: Project Grid Layout
nodes.prompt: Create a grid layout for displaying project cards.
nodes.what: A structured layout to organize project cards.
nodes.how: Use a responsive grid system with consistent spacing.

nodes.title: Project Filtering Options
nodes.prompt: Add filtering options for the projects showcase.
nodes.what: Interactive filters to refine project display.
nodes.how: Provide dropdowns or checkboxes for filtering by category or technology.

children.title: Filter Dropdown
children.prompt: Design a dropdown for selecting filter categories.

children.title: Filter Checkbox
children.prompt: Add checkboxes for filtering by technology.

children.title: Filter Interaction
children.prompt: Define the behavior for dynamic filtering updates.

nodes.title: Contact Form
nodes.prompt: Design a contact form for the contact section.
nodes.what: A form for users to send messages or inquiries.
nodes.how: Includes fields for name, email, message, and a submit button.

nodes.title: Filter Category Dropdown
nodes.prompt: Design a dropdown for selecting filter categories.
nodes.what: A dropdown menu for selecting project categories.
nodes.how: Allows users to filter projects by predefined categories.

nodes.title: Technology Filter Checkboxes
nodes.prompt: Add checkboxes for filtering by technology.
nodes.what: Checkboxes for filtering projects by technology.
nodes.how: Users can select multiple technologies to refine project results.

nodes.title: Dynamic Filtering Behavior
nodes.prompt: Define the behavior for dynamic filtering updates.
nodes.what: Real-time updates to project list based on filters.
nodes.how: Filters trigger dynamic changes without page reload.
